amendment.description: Amendment defines recommendations concerning 15 passenger van safety, railroad grade crossing safety, and medical certifications for a commercial driver's license as "significant safety recommendations" for purposes of annual regulatory status reports required by the Secretary of Transportation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to define recommendations concerning 15 passenger van safety, railroad grade crossing safety, and medical certifications for a commercial driver's license as "significant safety recommendations.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green (TX) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
